gaia::media::TransitionFadeBlack Class Reference

This class is used to render a fade to black and fade from black transition between two media items. More...

Detailed Description

This class is used to render a fade to black and fade from black transition between two media items.

Parameters:
transitionIdThe transition id

beforeMediaItemThe transition is applied to the beginning of this media item

Member Function Documentation

void gaia::media::TransitionFadeBlack::generate ( )

Generate the video clip for the specified transition.

This method may block for a significant amount of time. Before the method completes execution it sets the mFilename to the name of the newly generated transition video clip file.

Reimplemented from gaia::media::Transition.
